text: Happy summer friday! Here’s what’s happening this weekend. EATING My parm chicken meatballs with tomato orzo. And my mediterranean beef bowls. And these lettuce wrap cheeseburgers that are incredible. DRINKING Some mango frose. It is super refreshing and lovely for hot days. MAKING My puff pastry hot dogs. I usually only love about one good hot dog a year. Yet I could eat these constantly. They are SO good. BAKING My jalapeño cheddar cornbread. It’s truly unreal. SNACKING On cantaloupe prosciutto skewers. Crave them. And salted mojito watermelon wedges. GRILLING My grilled broccoli salad. And grilled panzanella. READING I’m hoping to start Atmosphere this week! Here’s my summer reading list for you. LISTENING To a nice little dad’s day playlist. WEARING The lulu align dress. There really is nothing better once it hits the high 80s. LOVING This incredible body butter and body oil. I’ve mentioned many times how I use lotion + oil after every single shower – so I go through a lot. I like to have two on hand and usually switch them up. I grabbed these at Target and oh my gosh. They are fabulous. Unscented (which is KEY!), so rich and thick but not greasy. SHOPPING Nordstrom has an awesome beauty/skincare points reward right now. Five things I am loving and think are worth it: the new YSL blushes, dior glow lip balm, sigma brushes, lake and sky 11 11 perfume and the best ice roller. BUYING The new hoka bondi 9s! I’ve worn so many pairs of the bondi 8s and adore them. Best shoe ever. I also want these super neon pink slides. SHARING A bunch of father’s day favorites, the outdoor entertaining essentials I use weekly, our pool favorites and summer beauty favorites. TRAVELING This weekend on a little beach vacation! Going with friends and we are so freaking excited. I have a whole list of vacation favorites here. CELEBRATING Father’s Day! I have a giant list of the best recipes to make this weekend. Also my mom’s birthday! We have a packed, busy weekend.
html:
Happy summer friday! Here’s what’s happening this weekend.

EATING

My parm chicken meatballs with tomato orzo. And my mediterranean beef bowls. And these lettuce wrap cheeseburgers that are incredible.

DRINKING

Some mango frose. It is super refreshing and lovely for hot days.

MAKING

My puff pastry hot dogs. I usually only love about one good hot dog a year. Yet I could eat these constantly. They are SO good.

BAKING

My jalapeño cheddar cornbread. It’s truly unreal.

SNACKING

On cantaloupe prosciutto skewers. Crave them. And salted mojito watermelon wedges.

GRILLING

My grilled broccoli salad. And grilled panzanella.

READING

I’m hoping to start Atmosphere this week! Here’s my summer reading list for you.

LISTENING

To a nice little dad’s day playlist.

WEARING

The lulu align dress. There really is nothing better once it hits the high 80s.

LOVING

This incredible body butter and body oil. I’ve mentioned many times how I use lotion + oil after every single shower – so I go through a lot. I like to have two on hand and usually switch them up. I grabbed these at Target and oh my gosh. They are fabulous. Unscented (which is KEY!), so rich and thick but not greasy.

SHOPPING

Nordstrom has an awesome beauty/skincare points reward right now. Five things I am loving and think are worth it: the new YSL blushes, dior glow lip balm, sigma brushes, lake and sky 11 11 perfume and the best ice roller.

BUYING

The new hoka bondi 9s! I’ve worn so many pairs of the bondi 8s and adore them. Best shoe ever. I also want these super neon pink slides.

SHARING

A bunch of father’s day favorites, the outdoor entertaining essentials I use weekly, our pool favorites and summer beauty favorites.

TRAVELING

This weekend on a little beach vacation! Going with friends and we are so freaking excited. I have a whole list of vacation favorites here.

CELEBRATING

Father’s Day! I have a giant list of the best recipes to make this weekend. Also my mom’s birthday! We have a packed, busy weekend.
